text: The 1977 Chicago Loop derailment occurred on Friday February 4, 1977, when a Chicago Transit Authority elevated train rear-ended another on the northeast corner of the Chicago Loop at Wabash Avenue and Lake Street during the evening rush hour.Chicago-L.org - Mishaps and Unusual Occurrences - The Loop Crash The collision forced the first four cars of the rear train off the elevated tracks, killing 11 people and injuring over 180 as the cars fell onto the street below. ==References== Category:20th century in Chicago Category:1977 in the United States Category:1970s in Illinois
title: 1977 Chicago Loop derailment
